org.jetel.graph.runtime

Class AuthorityProxyFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.graph.runtime.AuthorityProxyFactory

  • public class AuthorityProxyFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory for authority proxy extension point. Method createDefaultAuthorityProxy() creates instance of IAuthorityProxy with the highest priority. Basic Clover engine is delivered with single PrimitiveAuthorityProxy.
    See Also:
    AuthorityProxyDescription

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static IAuthorityProxy createAuthorityProxy(java.lang.String authorityProxyType)
      Creates authority proxy instance referenced by its type.
      static IAuthorityProxy createDefaultAuthorityProxy()
      Creates authority proxy instance with the highest priority.
      static void init()
      Populate internal cache of all available authority proxies - proxies from clover plugin system.
      static void registerAuthorityProxy(AuthorityProxyDescription authorityProxy)
      Registers authority proxy descriptor.
